title: All of a sudden, NASA’s return to the Moon feels rather real
description: "Artemis II is more than a mission to the Moon and back."

title: FDA details slew of failures at plant that made eye drops linked to deaths
description: FDA found brown slime, lack of sterility checks at Global Pharma's facility.

title: Judge slams Fox News for false election claims as Dominion wins key ruling
description: Judge rules Fox statements false; jury will decide on "actual malice" and damages.

title: Proton’s mass radius is apparently shorter than its charge radius
description: The quarks that give it charge aren't hanging out with the gluons that provide mass.

title: Today’s best deals: Apple MacBook Air, Apple Watch, Mac mini, Amazon Kindle
description: The Macs are matching their lowest tracked prices, as are the latest Kindles.

title: Google brings “Nearby Share” to Windows, making it easy to transfer files
description: Google dives into the competitive world of Windows + Android file sharing.

title: Users fume after My Cloud network breach locks them out of their data
description: The compromise allowed hackers to steal data, raising the specter of ransomware.

title: Blue Beetle trailer promises a classic superhero origin story
description: "The universe has sent you a gift. You have to figure out what you're gonna do with it."

title: Canadian statistics professor games Tim Hortons contest for 80-98% win rates
description: An app-based version of a giveaway contest was a rich target for mathematics.

title: Musk loses in court, has to delete tweet threatening Tesla workers who join union
description: Ruling also says Tesla illegally fired pro-union worker and must reinstate him.

title: Musk revokes NYT’s Twitter badge after news org refused to pay $1K a month
description: Musk called The New York Times "hypocritical" for not paying subscription fee.

title: New chipset could finally make it easier to build budget Ryzen 7000 PCs
description: A620 chipset is missing features, but (mostly) not the important ones.

title: It’s one last fight for Samuel L. Jackson’s Nick Fury in Secret Invasion trailer
description: "Very few of us know about the wars fought in the shadows that have raged on this planet."

title: Tesla built more cars than it could sell in Q1 2023
description: Sales grew 36% YoY, but much more is needed to reach 1.8 million cars in 2023.

title: A passenger aircraft that flies around the world at Mach 9? Sure, why not
description: “How much does the world change if you can get anywhere in an hour?”

title: Stable Diffusion copyright lawsuits could be a legal earthquake for AI
description: Experts say generative AI is in uncharted legal waters.

title: The 2023 Hyundai Ioniq 6: A streamlined look equals serious range
description: After so many electric crossovers, it's refreshing to see another sedan.
